channel.title: Client Background
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering if someone could help me change my background for my client? If you could that would great. :D

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

kennyg u made it way to confusing for him. here is a more detailed guide:

-go into your client folder
-click on files
-hit spirits
-find something named background or title or something (it would help if yu run the cleint 1st so yu know what ur looking 4)
-delete the IMAGE in there
-open up paint
-select the image yu want
-go to the “edit” tab and hit select all
-go back to the"edit" tab and hit copy
-go to the background folder
-go back to the “edit” tab and hit paste
-resize the image to your disired size (note: if it is too big the image will split in half

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @kennyg kennyg
item.description:
@kennyg wrote:

If you haven’t done it yet, then heres how you do it. Go into your client folder. Hit files, then hit spirts, then look around in that folder until you see the background of the client. It should be named like title or something. Delete it. Then paste in the background u want into that folder and name it the same exact thing the other one was. So if the first one was named title, you name the one you pasted in title.

Read full topic
